meanings.sent1: The horsecars clattered along the cobblestone streets.
meanings.sent2: People used to ride horsecars to get around the city.
meanings.sent3: The horsecar driver waved cheerfully at the passengers.
meanings.sent4: The horsecars moved as gracefully as dancers on the tracks.
meanings.sent5: Children loved to watch the horsecars go by, fascinated by the horses' trot.

meanings.definition: A type of public transportation in the form of a horse-drawn carriage on rails.
meanings.sent1: In the past, horsecars were a common sight in urban areas.
meanings.sent2: The horsecars provided a quaint and leisurely way to travel.
meanings.sent3: The horsecar conductor wore a smart uniform and a top hat.
meanings.sent4: The horsecars trundled along the tracks, carrying passengers to their destinations.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the horsecars' hooves on the rails was a familiar melody in the city.
